snippet.title: TFM: The First Men - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Here’s a look at TFM: The First Men, an upcoming game based on stories of the first men. Infinite possibilities await your very own Adam and Eve as they embark on a generation-spanning adventure. 

A strategy simulation enriched with character-driven base building, party-based exploration, and tactical real-time with pause combat. Inspired by the creation stories, Knights and Merchants, Rimworld, and almost every fantasy roleplaying game.

TFM: The First Men is scheduled to release sometime in the Spring of 2022 and is available to wishlist now on Steam. https://store.steampowered.com/app/700820/TFM_The_First_Men/

Discord: https://www.discord.gg/TFM

#gameplay #trailer #RTS
